nerot.task
Class BaseTask

java.lang.Object
  nerot.task.BaseTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storable, Primeable, Task
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenericTask, HttpGetTask, RssTask
public abstract class BaseTask
extends Object
implements Task, Storable, Primeable

A task that has a Store.

Field Summary
static int DEFAULT_MAX_PRIME_RUN_VALIDATION_ATTEMPTS

          The default interval in milliseconds between prime run validation attempts, which is 1000 (1 sec).

Method Detail

execute

public void execute()
Execute the task. This is a wrapper around doExecute() that times using Perf4J, logs, stores result, and wraps in a try/catch.

Specified by:
execute in interface Task
